title: Man made to wash Brahmin's feet over AI
description: Purshottam Kushwaha, who belongs to OBC community, allegedly posted on Instagram an Artificial Intelligence-generated image showing another villager wearing a garland of shoes.
content:
An FIR was registered in Madhya Pradesh's Damoh district on Sunday after a young man was allegedly forced to wash the feet of a Brahmin person and drink that water for sharing an “objectionable” AI-generated image, police said.

content:
